ygData.subject: Re: Boat Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Calliope! I am Sylly and am on my 8th level. I have been running back and forth between Freeport and Qeynos - where I was born for various
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Calliope!

I am Sylly and am on my 8th level. I have been running back and forth
between Freeport and Qeynos - where I was born for various adventures. My
next jaunt must be to Kelethin for my next song purchase.

I think bards are great char's and can do many things at low levels that
other char's can't - thanks to Selo's for that <g> If you don't have a drum
- get one soon it really helps you run fast and travelling is fun.

Also, helping people find their corpse is fun too. And I don't mean just the
easy ones - my first one was a mid-teen level ranger who got et out in the
plains of Everfrost! Now that was scary - having to find a corpse in a zone
I'd never been too!

What server are you on? I am on Innoruuk. I'll be happy to share adventures
and advice with you!

Sylly
Bard of the 8th level
Hog Callers Inn
Freeport, Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: VampyreDreams@... [mailto:VampyreDreams@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 11:37 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Boat Crashes

From: VampyreDreams@...
I am enjoying the sage and experienced words of our higher
level brothers and
sisters. But where are the young ones such as myself? The
tales and
adventures I read here are things I won't be seeing for some
time to come.
Are there any others in the 5th to 10th season with advice
and knowledge to
share as well? Let's speak up and help each other with
similar questions. I
have questions as well which I will post later (time for
work!).

Calliope of Freeport
6th Season Half Elf Bard
